definition.text: The Superalgos Platform is designed to serve algo-traders. But the project is expanding its scope to cater to all crypto users!

paragraphs.text: Incentivized by the protocol, algo-traders will compete to produce and disseminate trading signals.
Influencers will curate signal providers and broadcast select signals to their following.
Crypto users will follow influencers and get their signals on a mobile, desktop, or server app, free of charge! These apps will enable easy auto-trading, with free intelligence produced by experts!
Both algo-traders and influencers get paid by the protocol, while crypto users get all products and services free of charge. Quite disruptive, right?
